title: 13-year-old shot in the knee while passing around gun inside car
content:
A gun being passed around by a group of people inside a car went off early Monday evening (July 27), leaving a 13-year-old with a gunshot wound to his knee, New Orleans police said.
The car was in the 7500 block of Benson Street in eastern New Orleans when the gun discharged around 7:50 p.m., police said in a preliminary report. The teen was taken by private vehicle to an area hospital for treatment.
Police did not initially say why the gun was being passed around inside the car. NOPD spokesman Tyler Gamble said authorities are working to "corroborate" the teen's account, and no arrests have been made.
